REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM A F f0072 reute r f BC-BROWN-FORMAN-<BFD>-FI 03-05 0058

TEXT.TITLE: BROWN-FORMAN <BFD> FILES 200 MLN DLR DEBT OFFER
TEXT.BODY: Brown-Forman Corp said it filed a shelf registration covering up to 200 mln dlrs of debt securities guaranteed by its parent company, Brown-Forman Inc. Proceeds will be used to retire commercial paper, to repay some long-term debt and for general corporate purposes. Reuter
